What are the major steps that can be taken by the Indian government to make the country safe for women? Elaborate…

The major steps that can be taken by the Indian Government to make the make country safe for women are:-

1. to provide instant and toll free numbers to contact police if they are in problem. This system has been already started by Delhi Police Department after Delhi gang rape case.This should not be confined not only in big cities but also small towns and even in villages.

2. to provide securities in public transports, public places, so that women can get rid of the problems instantly. In this way, eve teasing can be controlled.

3. In Railways station, we can find women help centres. In the same way, governments should start women help centre in bus-stops and in busy places round the clock.

4. Women need to be more educated from childhood so that they become aware of their rights exactly.Government should start Women safety education in schools and colleges. And it should be mandatory for corporate and public sector to provide women safety education so that they can fearlessly complaint if anything goes wrong with them.

5. Government should decide a minimum educational level for marraige to avoid child marraige. Then only the exploits done by husbands, inlaws, parents and relatives can be minized. The power of education can give women the power to roar up their voice in any misdeeds.

 6. Government should give special instructions to police to act instantly if an woman is registering complaints.

7. Government should encourage women's associations for their developments to help the needy women.
